parameters: 回想
\n<Knight>"Emergency!! Doctor! Hurry! Hurry and examine her!!"

--Ah, it's similar to that time. Is it because my head
hurts...?

Upon seeing the patient being carried in, the hospital room
erupted into chaos.

The nurses surrounded the knight who was brought in,
panicking.
\n<Nurse>"Hurry up with the healing arts!"

\n<Knight>"Hey, what are you dawdling for! Quickly attend to this
person!"
\n<Nurse>"It's okay, please step back!"
\n<Knight>"You lot! If anything happens to this person--!"
The hospital room was engulfed in noise.

--Is this what they call a life flashing before one's
eyes...? A strange sensation... like I'm dreaming...
\n<Knight>"Where is the healer!? Where are they!"

\n<Nurse>"They're in the back room attending to a critically ill
patient!"

\n<Knight>"Idiot! Bring them here quickly! Prioritize this person over
anyone else!!"
\n<Nurse>"Don't shake them so much! They've injured their head!?"
\n<Knight>"Then hurry up and bring the healer!!"
\n<Nurse>"--Someone go call them quickly! Hurry!"

\n<Nurse>"And stop the bleeding! We're out of bandages!! Bring more
quickly!!"

--Ah, that's right... I seem to remember being awake at this
time...

\n<??>"...To interrupt the healing arts and forcibly drag me out,
what are you thinking? Are you trying to kill the soldier?"

\n<Knight>"The other soldiers don't matter! This person... Prioritize
Roselitte-sama's treatment first!"
\n<??>"Roselitte?... Ah, so this is the rumored Roselitte."

\n<??>"Unfortunately, there are patients who were brought in
earlier with severe injuries. I'll attend to this one
afterwards."
\n<Knight>"Fool... Don't joke around! What are you thinking!!"

\n<??>"The one joking here is you. No matter how important this
person is to you, to me, they are all patients equally."
\n<Knight>"What--!!"

\n<??>"There are many others just as critical in the back. They
are waiting for my treatment. I have no obligation to
prioritize this one, and I won't do anything irresponsible."

\n<Knight>"You bastard! Are you mocking the Royal Guard? And in front
of Roselitte-sama, do you think such behavior is
permissible!!"

\n<??>"It's fine if it's not permissible. As long as I can fulfill
my responsibilities now, I don't care what happens
afterwards."
\n<Knight>"Grr...! You! Cut it out!"

The knight drew his sword and pointed it at the healer. The
nurses screamed.

\n<Knight>"Heal Roselitte-sama!! Otherwise, I'll cut you down right
here!!"

\n<??>"...It seems you're the one who needs their head examined.
Sit down quietly over there. I'll attend to you later."
\n<Knight>"--You!!"
\n<Woman's voice>"--Please wait!"
Ameria appeared.
\n<Ameria>"Priest-sama, I will examine Roselitte-sama!"
\n<??>"...It's too much for you."
\n<Ameria>"I can do it! I will show you that I can heal her!!"

\n<??>"...Ameria, remember this well. If you say you will heal a
patient and fail to do so, it is as if you have killed them
yourself."
\n<Ameria>"..."

\n<??>"A healer must take responsibility to cure once they decide
to, and be prepared to kill. --Choose your next words
carefully."
\n<??>"Ameria, can you bear that responsibility and resolve?"
\n<Ameria>"--I can...! I will definitely heal her!!"

\n<??>"Then I will say no more. --Ameria, make sure to heal her.
Keep her alive. Save her. No matter what happens."
\n<Ameria>"Yes!!"
\n<Ameria>"--Move aside! I'm going to start the healing ritual!"
\n<Knight>"Hey, hey...! You're going to let this child--!"
\n<Ameria>"Quiet! I will definitely heal her, so don't interfere!!"

\n<Ameria>"...Roselitte-sama, it's going to be okay. I will definitely
heal you."
--Is that so...

\n<Ameria>"The wound is deep... Bring all the bandages and medicine we
have! The ritual alone won't be enough to stop the bleeding!
Hurry!!"
--Why didn't I notice before...
\n<Nurse>"--Sister! Her pulse is weakening! At this rate, she'll--!!"
--I am such a fool...

\n<Ameria>"It's okay, it's okay, Roselitte-sama, it's okay, you can do
it, keep fighting, because I can heal you, I'm trying my
best too, so please, keep fighting...!!"
--I want to see you again...
\n<Nurse>"--Sister!! The pulse! The pulse!!"
--I want to see you again and apologize...
\n<Knight>"Roselitte-sama!!"
--I want to see you again and say thank you...

\n<Ameria>"Roselitte!! Stay alive!! Just a little longer!! Just a
little bit longer!! Keep fighting!!!"
--But, it's already...
無音
--I can't hear anything anymore...
"Rosel-"
"Listen to my voice"
--I'm listening...

"I want to see Ameria. Surely you feel the same way, don't
you?"
"Then why don't we go see her together?"

"Just entrust yourself to me. Then, I can make your wish
come true."
--My... wish...?

"Tell me. With your own words. What you desire the most
right now. What you wish for the most."
"Understood"
"I will grant your wish"
広場その１

After defeating countless monsters, Roselitte and her
companions reached the plaza.
\n<Roselitte>"Deorc!"
\n<Deorc>"Ah?--What the, you! Why the hell are you here?!"

\n<Roselitte>"Unfortunately for you, we've cut down the monsters you
prepared."
\n<Roselitte>"Stop the monsters right now! Otherwise, I'll cut you down!"

\n<Deorc>"Tch! I don't know how you got here, but it seems you
haven't learned your lesson even after being beaten to a
pulp!"
\n<Deorc>"--Hey, you lot! Gather around!"

Deorc took out a book and began chanting a spell to control
monsters.
\n<Lyric>"Begi-Ade...!"
\n<Deorc>"Tear this wretch to pieces!!"
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrraaaaaaahhhhh!!"
\n<Roselitte>"Grr... Prepare yourself, Deorc!"
戦闘

\n<Lyric>"Roselitte, there he is! Aim for Deorc! There's no end if we
just keep defeating monsters!"
広場その２
\n<Deorc>"Guaaah! Damn it... that hurts...!"
\n<Roselitte>"Haa... Haa...! Surrender, Deorc!"
\n<Deorc>"Surrender, my ass! Who would listen to anything you say?!"
Deorc took out Begi-Ade.

\n<Deorc>"Have you forgotten?! With this, I am invincible! I can kill
you lot anytime! Don't underestimate me!"

\n<Deorc>"--Hey, Begi-Ade! Monsters! Send more monsters! And--give me
more power!!"
\n<Roselitte>"Not if I can help it!"
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrraaaaaaahhhhh!!"
\n<Roselitte>"--Hmph!"
A monster stood in Roselitte's way.
But that monster was thwarted by Ameria's magic.
\n<Ameria>"Miss Roselitte! Go!!"
\n<Roselitte>"--Thank you!"
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrraaaaaaahhhhh!!"
A new monster stood in Roselitte's way.
But that monster was thwarted by Lyric's magic.
\n<Lyric>"Hurry, Roselitte! Don't stop!!"
\n<Roselitte>"Thank you!!"

Many monsters lunged at Roselitte, but she kept moving
forward regardless. The monsters were taken down one after
another by Ameria and Lyric.

\n<Deorc>"--Damn it!! Hey, what's wrong with you, Begi-Ade! Lend me
power! Begi-Ade!!"
\n<Roselitte>"Deorc!!" Roselitte brandished her sword and leaped forward.

\n<Deorc>"Damn youuuuuu!!" Deorc roared and faced Roselitte with his
sword.
\n<Roselitte>"Haaaaaaah!!"
Roselitte's sword flash cleaved through Deorc's body.
\n<Deorc>"Guuuuuaaaaahhhhhhh!!"
The dying scream of Deorc as Begi-Ade fell from his grasp.
\n<Lyric>"--Roselitte! Cut the book too!"
\n<Roselitte>"But...!"
\n<Lyric>"Just do it! Kill it quickly!!"
\n<Roselitte>"Hmph--!"

Roselitte gripped her sword in a reverse grip and swung it
overhead.
\n<Roselitte>"This is the end--!!"
Roselitte's sword pierced through Begi-Ade.
広場その３
A moment of silence.
\n<Voice of the monster>"Ggggrrraaaaaahhhhhhh!!"
\n<Lyric>"What--ugh!?"

The monster's assault did not cease. The situation remained
unchanged.

\n<Roselitte>"--I've stabbed the book! The monster summoning spell should
be broken, now we just need to drive back the monsters...!"
\n<Lyric>"No, this is--"
\n<Voice of the monster>"Ggggrrraaaaaahhhhhhh!!"

\n<Lyric>"The spell isn't broken! The monster summoning spell is
still active!!"
\n<Roselitte>"What did you say...!?"
\n<Ameria>"Kyaaaaaaaah!"

Ameria's scream echoed. Ameria had been pinned down by the
monster.
\n<Roselitte>"Ameria!"
\n<Lyric>"Damn it!"
\n<Voice of the monster>"Ggggrrraaaaaahhhhhhh!!"

The monsters surrounded Roselitte and Lyric as they tried to
go to the rescue.
\n<Lyric>"Get out of the way! Move!"

Lyric cast magic at the monsters. But even as she took down
several, new ones blocked the path again.
\n<Lyric>"...Damn it! Ameria!"
\n<Ameria>"Kyaaaah! No, let go--ugh!!"
Ameria's small body was thrown.
\n<Lyric>"--This is bad"

And then a monster, armed with a sharp weapon, loomed over
Ameria from above.
\n<Ameria>"Ah--"
\n<Lyric>"This is bad... really bad!!"
The monster raised its weapon high above its head.
\n<Ameria>"Ah..."
\n<Lyric>"Bad bad bad bad bad!!!!!"
\n<Ameria>"...wa, wait--"
The monster swung down its weapon.
\n<Ameria>"Nooooooo!! Help meeeeeeeeeeeeee!!"
\n<Lyric>"Stopppppppp!!"
\n<Roselitte>"Ameriaaaaaaaaa!!"
A loud 'thud' echoed.
広場その４

The weapon that was swung down had stabbed into the ground
next to Ameria's head.
\n<Lyric>"Ah..."
\n<Roselitte>"...did it miss...?"
Roselitte and Lyric let out a sigh of relief.
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrrrrrrrrr..."

Then, the monsters began to retreat. They formed a circle
around Roselitte, Lyric, and Ameria, who was slumped a short
distance away.
\n<Roselitte>"...what in the world...?"
\n<??>"Nfufufu♪"
A voice could be heard from nowhere.
\n<??>"Nfufufufufu...♪"

The creepy laughter continued, and then something in the
shape of a person appeared before Ameria. It was blurred
like a mist, making it difficult to see clearly.

\n<??>"That was close, Ameria. Are you okay...?" The shadow
reached out its hand to Ameria.
\n<Ameria>"...thank you--"
\n<Lyric>"--stop, Ameria!!"
\n<Ameria>"Huh?"
\n<??>"Nfufufu♪"
The shadow roughly pulled Ameria's arm and embraced her.
\n<Ameria>"Kyaa!? What are you doing?!"
\n<Roselitte>"Grr...! Let go of Ameria!"

\n<??>"Nfufu... Such harsh words. I'm the one who saved this girl,
you know? A little gratitude wouldn't hurt."
\n<Ameria>"Ugh...! Who... who are you...?"

\n<??>"Have you forgotten me, Ameria? I'm the one who guided you
and gave you the holy book."
\n<Ameria>"--could it be... God...?"
\n<Roselitte>"What..."

\n<??>"Nfufufufufu♪ Yes, I am God♪ A kind-hearted God who extends
a hand to troubled lambs♪"
\n<Lyric>"--Don't joke around!!"
\n<Lyric>"Begieade!! There's no way you're God!"
\n<Roselitte>"What did you say...!?"
\n<??>"Nfufufufufu...♪"

\n<Begieade>"It's been a while, Lyric. And a first-time meeting for you,
Roselitte."

\n<Begieade>"My name is... Begieade. I devour desires and grant wishes,
a mysterious... yes, a very mysterious magic book."

\n<Begieade>"Ah, but now it's different. Nfufu♪ Sorry, let me correct
that. I am--"

The shadow calling itself Begieade gently stroked Ameria's
head.
\n<Begieade>"I am 'her' God...♪"
\n<Ameria>"God... Begieade as God...? How, why, what's going on...?"

\n<Begieade>"You don't need to be so scared. I have no intention of
harming you right now."

Saying that, Begieade took out the holy book from Ameria's
bosom.
\n<Lyric>"..."

\n<Lyric>"...So that's the real Begieade. Was the book Deorc had a
fake?"

\n<Begieade>"Nfufufufu...♪ It's surprising what doesn't get noticed.
It's really good that you're a demon."

Begieade looked at the holy book he had opened and gazed
upon it.

\n<Begieade>"Nfufu... Roselitte. This child has been 'longing' for you
quite a bit."
\n<Roselitte>"What did you say...?"

\n<Begieade>"She's been praying all this time, wanting power, desiring
power because she thinks of you."
\n<Ameria>"No--stop! Don't say it!!"

\n<Begieade>"You're also a sinful woman. When such a pure and innocent
child wishes for power to that extent, how can I not grant
it?♪"
\n<Roselitte>"...What on earth are you saying..."

\n<Begieade>"Nfufufufufu♪ You don't understand what I'm saying, do you?
You want to know, right...♪"
\n<Lyric>"..."

\n<Lyric>"--'The Gluttonous Demon Book, Begieade.' A demon book that
consumes desires and uses them to grant wishes."

\n<Lyric>"By chronicling what one thinks and how one acts in the
demon book, it can consume that person's desires."
\n<Lyric>"..."

\n<Lyric>"...I once vowed to take revenge on a female knight named
Tereza who killed my mother."

\n<Lyric>"And then, Begieade appeared before me and said, 'I'll let
you meet your mother. In exchange, let me consume Tereza's
'lust.'"

\n<Lyric>"So I schemed to make Tereza fall into depravity to fulfill
my wish, tricked her into writing in Begieade, and tried to
feed the book her desires."
\n<Roselitte>"..."
\n<Lyric>"...I don't know much about Ameria either."

\n<Lyric>"But she wished to become stronger. And she has been using
Begieade on you."
\n<Lyric>"All the while saying she was getting better. So, she said."
\n<Roselitte>"--Could it be..."
\n<Lyric>"...Roselitte, what did you do to Ameria...?"
\n<Roselitte>"--I did nothing... nothing at all...!"

\n<Roselitte>"Were you deceiving me...!? Ameria, are you saying you've
been using me to feed your desires to Begieade!? "
\n<Ameria>"No... That's not it! I didn't mean to do that!!"
\n<Lyric>"...Begieade. Did you resurrect me 'for that reason'?"

\n<Lyric>"Did you place me by Ameria's side, anticipating that I
would use Roselitte to regain my power?"
\n<Begieade>"..."
\n<Lyric>"...Ameria. Were you deceiving me...?"

\n<Ameria>"No... That's wrong! It's not true!! I wasn't deceiving
anyone! Believe me, Lyric!!"
\n<Lyric>"..."
\n<Ameria>"Lyric...k..."
\n<Begieade>"..."
\n<Begieade>"...Ahaha♪"
\n<Begieade>"Ahahahaha!!"
Begieade laughed heartily, holding his stomach.

\n<Begieade>"Let's put an end to these ridiculous fantasies! (laughs) If
we say such things, poor innocent Ameria will feel bad!!
(laughs) Ahahaha! How funny~!!"
\n<Lyric>"--Huh...? Not guilty of anything...?"
\n<Begieade>"Ahahahaha...ha-, my stomach hurts."

\n<Begieade>"Lyric. And Roselitte. You two are thinking too
complicatedly and are too suspicious of each other. Let's
think more simply."

\n<Begieade>"Rest assured. Ameria isn't lying, and she certainly isn't
deceiving anyone."
\n<Begieade>"And Roselitte, you haven't done anything wrong either."
\n<Begieade>"The one at fault is... yes, Ameria herself."
\n<Roselitte>"...What do you mean?"
\n<Begieade>"..."
\n<Begieade>"A little while ago, this girl made a big mistake."
\n<Ameria>"--!!"

\n<Begieade>"A big, big mistake... one that could influence the future
of the Valam Empire, a grave error."

\n<Begieade>"Roselitte, you would be quite angry if you heard about
it...♪"
\n<Roselitte>"...What mistake are you referring to--"
\n<Ameria>"Stop it!! Please don't talk about it, I beg you!!"
\n<Begieade>"...Nfufu"

\n<Begieade>"She was blamed, oppressed, and then she lost something very
important."
\n<Begieade>"That's why she prayed."

\n<Begieade>"'I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I'm sorry for not having the
strength.'

\n<Begieade>"'I want more power,' 'I want the power to save people,'
'And I want to save many people.'

\n<Begieade>"Seeing her wish like that, I decided to extend my hand to
help her. Begieade... no, I passed her the holy book."

\n<Begieade>"'If you wish for it' and work hard, at the end of the day
write down what you've worked hard on. Doing so will surely
become your strength... that's what I told her."

\n<Begieade>"This girl is a hard worker. She opened the book every day
to study, repented for her sins, prayed, and protected the
church all by herself."

\n<Begieade>"I am the Gluttony Demon Book, Begieade. I didn't teach her
about 'the mechanism,' but there was no need to purposely
teach the honest and hardworking Ameria."

\n<Begieade>"'I want to become strong.' I let her who wished for this
hold the pen, and when she 'worked hard,' I gave her power."
\n<Lyric>"..."
\n<Lyric>"...Hey, wait. That means--"

\n<Lyric>"Does that mean you were just cooperating with Ameria and
fulfilling her wishes...?"

\n<Lyric>"You fed on Ameria's 'desire to become strong' and her
efforts, and used that as nourishment to make her stronger?"
\n<Begieade>"That's right."
\n<Lyric>"..."! Lyric's eyes were wide with shock.
\n<Roselitte>"..."
\n<Roselitte>"...I don't understand."
\n<Begieade>"Hm?"

\n<Roselitte>"Then why did you lend your power to Deorc and instigate
this current turmoil?"

\n<Roselitte>"If you were simply giving Ameria power out of goodwill,
there was no need to make use of Deorc."

\n<Roselitte>"Especially since you used demon taming techniques, the
Taruza region has been ravaged, and Ameria's church has been
lost."
\n<Begieade>"..."
\n<Roselitte>"What is your true purpose?"
\n<Begieade>"...Nfufu♪"

\n<Begieade>"True purpose or not. I just wanted to grant Ameria's
wishes, that's all I helped with."
\n<Roselitte>"Don't speak so carelessly!"
\n<Begieade>"It's true. Because--"
無音

\n<Begieade>"'Because if Deorc goes on a rampage, Ameria's wishes will
come true,' right?"
\n<Roselitte>"--What...?"
\n<Ameria>"Eh...?"
\n<Lyric>"--Ah!!"

\n<Begieade>"This child is exceptionally kind and devoted, always
wishing to 'save people' with her own power."
\n<Begieade>"Including you, Roselitte."
\n<Roselitte>"...What exactly do you mean...?"
\n<Begieade>"You still don't understand?"
\n<Begieade>"I lent my power to Deorc and had him rampage extensively."

\n<Begieade>"Because of that, many people were hurt, died, and lost so
much."
\n<Begieade>"All of that was prepared to 'let Ameria save them'."
\n<Roselitte>"..."
\n<Ameria>"...To let me save them...?"
\n<Begieade>"Yes, Ameria♪"

\n<Begieade>"You've helped many people so far, and it seems you've
received a lot of gratitude. You seemed happy about it, and
that made me very happy too."

\n<Begieade>"Moreover, you've become much stronger and resilient♪ Now
you can save even more people♪"
\n<Ameria>"...No..."

\n<Begieade>"I'll attack another town for you. Maybe Annabel again? It
has a lot of people, and many will need you♪"
\n<Ameria>"Ah...no..."

\n<Begieade>"Oh, and in Lere, many soldiers were injured♪ A lot of them
died too, but if you go now, you can still save many
soldiers!♪"
\n<Ameria>"Ah...ahh...! Aaaaaaaahhhhh...!!"

\n<Begieade>"Nfufu... Ameria...?" Begieade whispered softly into
Ameria's ear.
\n<Begieade>"It's good that your wish came true... Hallelujah...♪"
\n<Ameria>"--Ah!!!!!!"

\n<Ameria>"Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh
h!!!!!!"

\n<Begieade>"Ahhahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahah
ahahaha!!!!!!"
\n<Lyric>"--Don't mess with me..."
\n<Roselitte>"Begieade!!!!!!"

\n<Roselitte>"Why... Why would you do such a terrible thing!! What has
Ameria ever done to deserve this!!"

\n<Begieade>"Ahahaha! Why? Why, you ask? Nfufufufufufu!♪ Want to hear?
You want to know, right!??"

\n<Ameria>"Uwaaaaaaannnnnnn!! I'm sorry!! I'm sorry!!
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!"
\n<Begieade>"That is because~♪"
Begieade grabbed the sobbing Ameria's face and said.
\n<Begieade>"Her face just pisses me off♪"

\n<Ameria>"Aaaaaaaaahhhhh... Hic! Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuhhhhhhhhhhhh!! I'm
sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry!!!!!"
\n<Begieade>"Ahhahahahahahahahahahahahaha!!!!!!"
\n<Lyric>"Don't screw arounddddddddddd!!!!!!"

\n<Lyric>"Begieade!! You... Youuuuuuuu!! I'll kill you right now!!!!
Tear you to pieces!! Burn you to ash!!!!"

\n<Begieade>"Ahhahaha!! Why are you so angry, Lyric? You're supposed to
hate Ameria too♪"

\n<Begieade>"You've realized it long ago, haven't you?... Her true
identity."

\n<Begieade>"The female knight of the Kiska Kingdom who killed your
mother... and even you, Teresa Lecruele."

\n<Begieade>"But that name is a lie. And everything about her is a
sham."

\n<Begieade>"Her real name is... Stella. Stella Aurcus. A knight of the
Valam Empire and--"
\n<Begieade>"--Ameria. She's this child's older sister."
\n<Lyric>"...That's a lie..."
\n<Begieade>"Nfufu...♪"
\n<Lyric>"It's a lie!!"
\n<Begieade>"You know it's true...♪"

\n<Begieade>"I tried to devour Teresa, but I couldn't. Instead, I got
slashed by her sword and suffered terribly..."

\n<Begieade>"That's why I'm seething with anger. I want to meet Teresa
as soon as possible, beat her to a pulp, and then devour
her."

\n<Begieade>"But no matter what, I couldn't find her. She's managed to
hide herself well, and no matter how much I search, she's
nowhere to be found."

\n<Begieade>"But you know, while searching, I found out she had a
sister. That surprised me, but what shocked me the most
was... Lyric. That your corpse was there."

\n<Begieade>"That's when I was certain. Ameria is Teresa's sister, and
if I watched you two, I would surely meet Teresa."

\n<Begieade>"But just waiting around is boring, right? So I thought I'd
do something that Teresa would hate the most, and approached
Ameria."
\n<Lyric>"Something... Teresa would hate...?"

\n<Begieade>"...Nfufu♪ I wonder what Teresa would think if she knew. If
she knew that because of her, Ameria is suffering so
much...♪"
\n<Lyric>"..."
\n<Roselitte>"How low can you go...?"
Roselitte readied her sword.

\n<Roselitte>"...I understand your circumstances very well. But
understanding does not give me any reason to sympathize with
you."

\n<Roselitte>"I'm ashamed that I even doubted Ameria for a moment...
Begieade, I will never forgive you."

\n<Lyric>"Roselitte. I will be the one to kill him. I won't be
satisfied until he's torn to pieces."

\n<Roselitte>"Unfortunately, I also desperately want to kill him... How
about we split his body in half first and then tear him into
eight pieces?"
\n<Lyric>"I like that plan, I'm in."
\n<Ameria>"Ah... aaaaaaaahhhhh... I'm sorry... I'm sorry..."

\n<Roselitte>"Don't apologize, Ameria. You haven't done anything wrong.
All the blame lies with Begieade."
\n<Roselitte>"I'll save you soon.--Prepare yourself, Begieade."
\n<Begieade>"...Nfufu...♪"
\n<Begieade>"I like it, I like it. This is fun... so much fun."

\n<Begieade>"Everything is going just as I imagined. When things go this
smoothly, it's very enjoyable♪"

\n<Begieade>"--Now, for the next game. Let's enjoy ourselves to the
fullest♪"
Suddenly, Begieade stole Ameria's lips.
\n<Ameria>"Huh!!?"
\n<Roselitte>"Wha--"

In an instant, the mist surrounding Begieade enveloped
Ameria.
\n<Lyric>"--No! Stop it, Begieade!!"

The black mist wrapped around Ameria and concealed her. When
it cleared, Begieade was nowhere to be seen.
\n<Ameria>"..."
\n<Roselitte>"--Ah, Ameria...?"
\n<Ameria>"Nfufufufufu♪" Ameria let out a sinister laugh.
\n<Roselitte>"An imposter...?"
\n<Lyric>"--No! He's taken over Ameria's body!"
\n<Roselitte>"What did you say!?"

\n<Begieade>"Ahahahaha! You want to kill me, don't you!? Fine, fine!!
Come at me, I'll take you on!!"

\n<Lyric>"No, we can't attack! If we do, Ameria will die too! We have
to draw Begieade out of her!"
\n<Roselitte>"Draw him out, but how!?"
\n<Lyric>"I don't know!"
\n<Roselitte>"What do we do!?"
\n<Begieade>"Not coming? Then maybe I should come to you!"
\n<Roselitte>"Grr...! Lyric, get behind me!"
\n<Lyric>"Damn it... Damn it!!"
戦闘
\n<Roselitte>"Guh, aah...!"

\n<Begieade>"...What's this? You're not even trying. Is this girl that
important to you?"
\n<Roselitte>"Don't speak with Ameria's voice! It's disgusting!"

\n<Begieade>"Oh scary. Roselitte, your mission is to stop the demons and
save Taruze, right?"

\n<Begieade>"If you kill me now, everything will be resolved, right? If
many lives can be saved by the death of just one Ameria,
shouldn't you choose that option?"
\n<Roselitte>"Don't joke with me!"

\n<Roselitte>"The one who has worked tirelessly for the peace of this
land is none other than Ameria! I will not acknowledge a
peace without her!"
\n<Begieade>"That's not something an Imperial Knight would say."

\n<Begieade>"Even as we speak, many people are getting hurt by my demon
minions. Are you planning to abandon them?"
\n<Roselitte>"Grr...!"
\n<Lyric>"Don't listen to him, Rose!"

\n<Lyric>"Using my magic for your own whims...! My demon control
magic is too good for the likes of you! Give it back,
thief!!"

\n<Begieade>"Ahaha♪ Thief is a good word-- Ah!" Begieade suddenly
clapped his hands.

\n<Begieade>"That's right, that's right, I completely forgot! Demons,
demons! There's one more wish of Ameria's that I need to
fulfill."

\n<Begieade>"Roselitte. You made a promise with Ameria, didn't you? To
'stop the demons'."
\n<Roselitte>"...What about it?"

\n<Begieade>"Yeah. So I have to stop the demons. I want to fulfill
Ameria's wish. So... don't get in my way."
Begieade pointed his staff at Lyric.

\n<Begieade>"--Lyric. If you die, the demons will stop. So be a good
girl and stay still."
\n<Roselitte>"What--"

\n<Lyric>"...What do you mean? You have my demon control magic.
Killing me won't change anything."
\n<Begieade>"Nfufu... You really don't understand anything."

\n<Begieade>"You are my 'puppet,' 'Lyric.' What's yours is mine. I have
the right to use everything you possess."

\n<Begieade>"You've seen the demons and felt your own magic power,
haven't you? It's not because 'your magic was stolen.' It's
because 'your magic was being used.'"
\n<Lyric>"...Could it be... that 'I have' the demon control magic--"
\n<Begieade>"'But I am the one using it'...♪"

\n<Lyric>"That can't be... impossible! You can't just use someone
else's magic without permission, that shouldn't be
possible!"
\n<Begieade>"It's possible. Because you are a puppet."
\n<Lyric>"I am not a puppet!"
\n<Begieade>"You are a puppet. Then tell me, what is your real name?"
\n<Lyric>"--Huh? Why are you asking all of a sudden..."

\n<Begieade>"The name 'Lyric' was given by me, wasn't it? How long will
you use that name? If you're not a puppet, then tell me your
real name."
\n<Lyric>"--Ha, hah? Don't make fun of me! I am..."
前作のフラッシュバック
\n<Lyric>"--Eh...?"
\n<Begieade>"...Nfufufufufu♪"

\n<Lyric>"Eh...ehh...?" Lyric clutched her head and fell to her
knees.
\n<Roselitte>"Lyric!? What's wrong?"
\n<Lyric>"No... I am... I, uh...ehh...?"

\n<Begieade>"Ahahahahaha! How pathetic, claiming you're not a puppet
while casually using the name I gave you!"
\n<Lyric>"I, I... me?? Eh? I am, my, name... I'm not Lyric..."
\n<Roselitte>"Lyric! Pull yourself together!"

\n<Lyric>"--No! I'm not Lyric! I had a proper name! Right!? That's
right, isn't it!!?"
\n<Begieade>"Hmm... what was it again...?♪"
\n<Lyric>"Tell me!! What is my real name!!"
\n<Begieade>"...You don't have a name."
\n<Begieade>"...But the one who 'created' you said this,"
\n<Begieade>"'Error Doll'... that's what they called you."
\n<Lyric>"Error... Doll...?"
Lyric sat down on the spot with a thud.
\n<Roselitte>"Lyric!? What's happening to you?"

\n<Begieade>"Nfufu...♪ Now that I've given you a parting gift of
knowledge, maybe it's time to end this."
Magic power gathered in Begieade's staff.

\n<Roselitte>"No, Lyric! You don't have to listen to him! It's all lies
meant to deceive you!"
\n<Lyric>"Lies..."

\n<Roselitte>"Yes, lies! You're not the type to fall for such things, are
you!?"
\n<Begieade>"...♪"
Great magic power continued to gather.

\n<Roselitte>"So stand up! Are you just going to sit there and be killed
in silence!? You, who always lies--!!"
\n<Lyric>"--Sorry, Roselitte..."
Lyric hung her head and shook it from side to side.
\n<Lyric>"I... I mean..."
\n<Lyric>"Being called by a name... being called 'Error Doll'..."
The girl lifted her face. It was smiling.

\n<Elardor>"I felt relieved... Being told a name I couldn't remember,
I... felt at ease..."
\n<Roselitte>"--No, that's wrong! Stand up!! Run away!!!!"
\n<Elardor>"Ahaha... somehow, my head is all messed up..."
\n<Roselitte>"Lyric!!!!!"
\n<Elardor>"Roselitte, please take care of Ameria--"
\n<Begieade>"Goodbye. And die 'for me.'"
The magic was released, and it assaulted the girl.
\n<Elardor>"Help me--"
\n<Roselitte>"----!!!"
激しい音と、暗転。
\n<Roselitte>"Gah--ah...!!"
With a dull thud, Roselitte, who had shielded Elardor, fell.
\n<Begieade>"--Huh?"
\n<Elardor>"Ro... Roselitte...!!?"
前作ＯＰと同様の構図で、抱き上げるイラスト
Blood was flowing from the location of Roselitte's wound.
\n<Elardor>"Why... why, how could this..."
\n<Roselitte>"Ah... my injury... is...?"

\n<Elardor>"Ah... there's no way...! Can't you see it...!? Are you
stupid...!?"

\n<Roselitte>"So... that's right... sorry... even with my eyes open...
it's pitch dark..."
\n<Elardor>"What--!"

\n<Roselitte>"Sorry... I couldn't do anything... and just dragged you
down..."
\n<Elardor>"That's not true... Roselitte!! Roselitte!!"
\n<Roselitte>"I'm sorry..."
\n<Elardor>"...Ro... Roselitte..."
\n<Begieade>"..."

\n<Begieade>"Ah-ah, what's this. I didn't expect things to turn out like
this."

\n<Begieade>"I went to all the trouble of planning to have Ameria kill
Lyric and make Ameria suffer."

\n<Elardor>"--You bastarddddddd!! That's enough!! Neither Ameria nor
Roselitte did anything wrong!!"

\n<Elardor>"The one who failed before was me!! If you want to take your
frustrations out, then hurt me!! Why don't you just kill me
quickly?"

\n<Begieade>"That's obvious, isn't it? It hurts you more when others are
involved, right?"

\n<Elardor>"Then just kill me already!! You've had enough fun, right!?
Just do it!!"
\n<Begieade>"Eh-, but you know"
\n<Elardor>"Kill me!!"
\n<Begieade>"Hmm"
\n<Elardor>"I said kill me!!!!!"
\n<Begieade>"..."
\n<Begieade>"Okay, I get it. Fine."
\n<Begieade>"But doing the same thing lacks creativity."

\n<Begieade>"Actually, I was thinking of having Ameria kill you, and
Roselitte would die unnoticed by Ameria, without being seen
off."
\n<Begieade>"So instead, you can die quietly in her place."
\n<Elardor>"..."

\n<Elardor>"Haha... You're too despicable... I'm at a loss for
words..."
\n<Begieade>"Thank you♪ So then... here. Let's say our final goodbyes."
As he said that, his body suddenly lost strength,
\n<Ameria>"--Nooooooo!! Roselitte-san!! Roselitte-san!!!!"
\n<Elardor>"Ah, Ameria!? "

\n<Ameria>"She was finally getting better!! She could have been
healed!! Why!! Whyyyyyy!!!!!"

\n<Elardor>"Ameria, Ameria!! It's okay, Roselitte isn't dead!! She's
just sleeping!!"
--Lies aren't good, you know.
\n<Elardor>"Shut up! Be quiet!!"

\n<Ameria>"Aaaaaahhh...! I'm sorry! I'm so sorry! Please forgive
me...!!"
\n<Elardor>"Ameria, it's okay. Look at me, look...!"
\n<Ameria>"Hic, hic! Uwaaaa! Forgive me, I'm sorry, I'm so sorry...!!"
\n<Elardor>"Look at me!!!"
\n<Ameria>"--!"
\n<Elardor>"...It's okay. Don't worry. I'll take care of it."
\n<Ameria>"..."
\n<Ameria>"...Really...?"
\n<Elardor>"Yeah. It's true."
\n<Elardor>"I will grant your wish, not Begieade."
\n<Elardor>"So... tell me your request. What do you want me to do?"
\n<Ameria>"..."
\n<Ameria>"...Lyric. I--"
\n<Elardor>"Yeah?"
\n<Ameria>"I want to be with Lyric--"
--Time's up.
Mist once again envelops Ameria's body.

\n<Ameria>"Ah--!? No!! I don't want this!! I don't want this
anymore!!"
\n<Elardor>"Ameria--!!!!"

\n<Ameria>"Nooooo!! Lyric! I want to be with Lyric!! I want to be with
you forever!! So--!!"
\n<Ameria>"I'll try my best too!! So please!! Help me!! Lyric--!!"
Ameria's voice cuts off, and a sly smile reappears.
\n<Begieade>"Did you get to say your final goodbyes?♪"
\n<Elardor>"..."

\n<Begieade>"Nfufu...♪ Alright, that's enough. I'm heading to Raeve now.
Let's go see the city fall together."

With those words, Begieade used his monster taming magic.
The monsters that had been quiet until now began to move.

\n<Begieade>"Goodbye, Lyric. It was fun while it lasted. You've been
quite helpful to me."

\n<Begieade>"But either way, you were meant to die from the start. It
would be inconvenient for me if you didn't die."

\n<Begieade>"There's a certain taste in deliberately not witnessing your
death throes."
\n<Begieade>"...Do you have any last words?"
\n<Elardor>"Die, you piece of trash."
\n<Begieade>"Nfufu♪ Okay, bye now～♪"
Begieade disappeared using magic.
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrrruuuuuuuuuu..."
The monsters began to creep towards Elardor.
\n<Elardor>"..."
\n<Elardor>"...Hah. 'I want to be with you'... huh?"

\n<Elardor>"How can you say something so embarrassing... Don't you
think so, Roselitte?"
\n<Elardor>"..."

\n<Elardor>"...But it's strange. Somehow, just those words... strangely
enough, they give me strength."
--Thump.

\n<Elardor>"I think... I've always been lonely. I've been alone ever
since my mother died..."
--Thump.

\n<Elardor>"I can't remember anything from before that, but I probably
have always been lonely. Because being told 'I want to be
with you' makes me feel... so..."
\n<Elardor>"So... happy..."
--Thump.
\n<Elardor>"...The past, or who I am, none of that matters anymore."
\n<Elardor>"If Ameria, 'Lyric' and--"

\n<Lyric>"'If you' wish to be with me, then I must stay by your
side."
--Thump.
\n<Lyric>"After all, I am--"
--Thump.
\n<Lyric>"A mysterious girl who grants wishes."
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrrrraaaaaaaahhhhh!!"
\n<Lyric>"..."
暗転
\n<Lyric>"--Roselitte. Hear my voice."
分岐選択肢。
リリックに一定以上の欲を喰わせていることで
トゥルーエンド
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrraaaaaaahhhhh!!"
\n<Lyric>"..."

Countless monsters surrounded Lyric, growling. Lyric stood
with fallen Roselitte at her back, confronting the
creatures.

\n<Lyric>"Seriously, what a terrible situation. To think they'd try
to have me killed by these weaklings... In a way, it's the
cruelest thing."
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrraaaaaaahhhhh!!"
The monster roared and lunged to attack.
\n<Lyric>"You think so too, right? Hey--"

In an instant, the attacking monsters were bisected by a
flash of the sword.
\n<Roselitte>"...You're quite calm to be able to stand there like that."
\n<Lyric>"Hey there, Rosé. How are you feeling?"
\n<Roselitte>"Feeling... you say?"

Roselitte looked around. The monsters, though flustered,
still encircled the two, baring their fangs.
\n<Roselitte>"Not too bad."
\n<Lyric>"That's good to hear♪"
\n<Voice of the monster>"Grrrrraaaaaaahhhhh!!"

The monsters attacked. Roselitte repelled them with her
sword, and Lyric incinerated them with magic.
\n<Roselitte>"Where is Ameria?"

\n<Lyric>"She headed towards Lereve. Don't worry, I have a rough idea
of where she is. I'll guide us there."
\n<Roselitte>"Understood.... And what about our chances of winning?"
\n<Lyric>"...What do you think?" Lyric said with a grin.

\n<Roselitte>"...Hehe. Let's just say we'll manage with fighting spirit,"
she replied with a smile.
\n<Lyric>"Ahaha♪ That's the spirit.... Shall we go then?"
\n<Roselitte>"--Lyric. Just one last thing."
\n<Lyric>"Hmm?"
\n<Roselitte>"...No. I'll tell you after everything is over."
\n<Lyric>"What's with that? Don't be such a tease."
\n<Roselitte>"Hehe... Let's go. To save Ameria. And then--"
\n<Lyric>"We'll tear Begi-Ade to pieces!"
The two of them dashed off.
